SELECT q.SEQ, c.CATEGORY_NAME, q.TITLE, q.CONTENT, q.ID, q.REGDATE, q.PROCESS, q.QNA_CODE FROM QNA q ,QNA_CATEGORY c WHERE q.QNA_CODE = c.QNA_CODE AND REF=#{seq} ORDER BY REGDATE ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE QNA SET QNA_CODE=#{qna_code},TITLE=#{title},CONTENT=#{content} , REGDATE=SYSDATE WHERE SEQ=#{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA VALUES (QNA_SEQ.nextval,#{qna_code},#{title},#{content},#{id},SYSDATE, (SELECT REF FROM QNA WHERE SEQ=#{seq}), 'COMPLETE')
mapper.update: UPDATE QNA SET PROCESS = #{process} WHERE SEQ = #{seq}
mapper.select: SELECT SEQ,ID,NOTICEFLAG,TITLE,PROCESS,REGDATE FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY REGDATE DESC) RN, SEQ, NOTICEFLAG, TITLE, CONTENT, REGDATE FROM NOTICE ) WHERE CEIL(RN/10)=#{pnum}
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET NOTICEFLAG =#{noticeflag}, TITLE=#{title}, CONTENT=#{content} WHERE SEQ=#{seq}
